casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Fernando Aponte (8742)

Dupont, C. J., Spallone and Norcott, Js.

Argued January 8 decision released January 22, 1991 Ronald Gold, assistant public defender, for the appellant (defendant). ' Julia DiCocco Dewey, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were John M. Bailey, state’s attorney, sad Mark Brodsky, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
